## contractType variable

**Signature:**

```typescript
contractType: {
  cacheKey: (
    contractAddress: RequiredParam<ContractAddress>,
    chainId: RequiredParam<SUPPORTED_CHAIN_ID>,
  ) => import("@tanstack/react-query").QueryKey;
  useQuery: typeof useContractType;
  fetchQuery: typeof fetchContractType;
}
```
